uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data

Class Discount

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.Discount

  • public class Discount
extends java.lang.Object
    Called by Order every time an Item is added to determine if any discounts should be applied to an order and calculates the prices accordingly.
    Author:
    Connor Goddard (clg11)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Discount(Order order)
      Instantiates a new discount and sets pizzaLimit value to 2.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyDiscount1(OrderItem orderItem)
      Applies the "3 x Large Pizza" discount.
      void applyDiscount2()
      Applies the "Half price" discount.
      void checkDiscount(OrderItem orderItem)
      Uses the number of items gathered from checkDiscount() to determine if a discount should be applied, and applies the discounts accordingly.
      void checkQuantities()
      Determines how many of each product (Pizza/Drink/Side) are currently contained within the 'itemArray' arraylist inside the Order.
      int getDrinkNo()
      Gets the number of drinks currently in the order
      int getPizzaLimit()
      Gets the current limit set for the number of large pizzas that are required for a discount to be applied
      int getPizzaNo()
      Gets the number of large currently pizzas in the order
      int getSideNo()
      Gets the number of sides currently in the order
      boolean isApplyOnce()
      Checks if a discount has already been applied to the order

      • getPizzaLimit

        public int getPizzaLimit()
        Gets the current limit set for the number of large pizzas that are required for a discount to be applied
        Returns:
        the limit of large pizzas before a discount is applied

      • isApplyOnce

        public boolean isApplyOnce()
        Checks if a discount has already been applied to the order
        Returns:
        True, if a discount has already been applied to the order

      • checkQuantities

        public void checkQuantities()
        Determines how many of each product (Pizza/Drink/Side) are currently contained within the 'itemArray' arraylist inside the Order.

      • checkDiscount

        public void checkDiscount(OrderItem orderItem)
        Uses the number of items gathered from checkDiscount() to determine if a discount should be applied, and applies the discounts accordingly.
        Parameters:
        orderItem - The current OrderItem being accessed inside the 'itemArray' array list

      • applyDiscount1

        public void applyDiscount1(OrderItem orderItem)
        Applies the "3 x Large Pizza" discount. Takes the price of the latest large pizza to be added and sets its price to '£0.00'
        Parameters:
        orderItem - The current OrderItem being accessed inside the 'itemArray' array list

      • applyDiscount2

        public void applyDiscount2()
        Applies the "Half price" discount. Halves the subtotal of the order.
